```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
library(hrbrthemes)
library(ggrepel)
```

#help from this website
#https://r-graph-gallery.com/connected_scatterplot_ggplot2.html

```{r}
# Load dataset
data <- read.csv("/scratch/Shares/rinn/tenaya/rChIP/rChIP/WebofScience_Publications_RNA_Chromatin.csv", header=T)

select_years <- data %>% sample_frac(0.5)

# Plot
data %>%
  tail(60) %>%
  ggplot( aes(x=Publication.Years, y=Record.Count, label=Publication.Years)) +
    geom_line( color="grey") +
    geom_text_repel(data=select_years) +
    geom_point(shape=21, color="black", fill="#69b3a2", size=1) +
    theme_ipsum() +
    ggtitle("Publications on RNA and Chromatin")
```
